name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DA Checker Pro: Website Traffic & Age Analyzer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly analyze your domain's SEO performance, including Domain Authority, site traffic, and age—all for free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of data for free with our all-in-one Domain Analysis Extension! Gain detailed insights into your website’s performance and discover areas for growth. Our extension provides critical metrics such as:

- 💪 **Domain Authority**: Get an indication of your domain’s strength with DA and PA scores. Analyze the authority of any website.

- ⌛ **Domain Age**: Determine the age of a domain to better understand its history and impact on SEO.

- 🔗 **Backlinks**: Track your backlink profile with millions of backlinks to monitor your site’s authority.

- 🌍 **Referring Domains**: Understand your domain’s reach with insights into thousands of referring domains.

- 📈 **Estimated Monthly Visits**: Analyze your website’s traffic with accurate monthly data, all for free.

- 📊 **Traffic Sources**: Discover where your traffic is coming from with a breakdown of sources, including:
  - Direct 🚶‍♂️
  - Mail 📧
  - Paid Referrals 💰
  - Referrals 🔁
  - Search 🔍
  - Social 📱

- 🔝 **Top Keywords**: Identify high-volume keywords driving traffic to your site, helping you to optimize for success.

Our extension is perfect for website owners, SEO experts, and digital marketers looking to enhance their online presence and drive more traffic to their sites. With low competition keywords and detailed metrics, you can easily improve your search engine rankings and attract more visitors.

🌟 Get started today and take your website to the next level with our Domain Analysis Extension!
